title: 英语考试"成千上万"这个短语你猜我写成了什么
author: 帕帕武
txt_content:
考试题目
成千上万的学生在操....场上活动 题目不是这个我忘记了
原本改写thousands of
我完美的写成了thousand years

replies.txt_content: 咦？不是 Turn to one thousand, More than ten thousand. 吗？

replies.author: Hueihuea
replies.txt_content:
1139365029 发表于 2019-3-22 19:00
咦？不是 Turn to one thousand, More than ten thousand. 吗？
啊哈哈哈哈哈 真实

replies.author: Li_Hii
replies.txt_content:
skpsk自己家 发表于 2019-3-22 19:10
啊哈哈哈哈哈 真实
嘤该是：the thousand have ten thousand

replies.author: Mike_Play_OK
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mike_Play_OK 于 2019-3-22 19:39 编辑 
万年的学生在操场上。
emm…你这个英语水平，我上小学时英语次次考试一百分。
隔壁老王：这人真不要脸。

replies.author: 我爱魁拔
replies.txt_content: the man，turning to thousand ，f*king the man，ten thousand.

replies.author: Li_Hii
replies.txt_content:
我爱魁拔 发表于 2019-3-22 22:14
the man，turning to thousand ，f*king the man，ten thousand.
我觉得你口吐芬芳应该加男魂符号
说起来你可能不信我竟然成千上万都不会。。

replies.author: 我爱魁拔
replies.txt_content:
Li_Hii 发表于 2019-3-22 22:17
我觉得你口吐芬芳应该加男魂符号
**,hear no evil,speak no evil

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 直译：become thousand up to several ten thousand

replies.author: 夏夜的风w
replies.txt_content: 这  成千上万。。。作文吗
